mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.cat_no, b.member_no, v.vol_no, v.vol_location, v.vol_confirm, v.vol_duedate FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN VOLUNTEER v ON b.BOARD_NO = v.VOL_NO WHERE b.CAT_NO = 1 AND b.BOARD_DELETED = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (member_no, board_title, board_content, cat_no) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{board.boardTitle}, #{board.boardContent}, 1)

INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER (vol_no, vol_location, vol_duedate, vol_wdate1, vol_wdate2) VALUES (#{board.boardNo}, #{board.volunteers.volLocation}, #{board.volunteers.volDuedate}, #{board.volunteers.volWdate1}, #{board.volunteers.volWdate2})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN VOLUNTEER v ON b.BOARD_NO = v.VOL_NO WHERE b.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
